product_name: Delta Cycle PostHaste Bike Rack - Quick-Release - Special Buy
long_description: Built with a quick-release clamp for easy installation, the Delta Cycle Post Haste Bike Rack adds 20 lbs. of cargo capacity to your road or mountain bike for errands and commutes. Quick-release clamp securely fits seat posts with a 24 - 32mm diameter. Rubber grippers keep loads in place. Reflector bracket included. 4.5 in. wide, 12.5 in. long. Special buy.
short_description: Built with a quick-release clamp for easy installation, the Delta Cycle Post Haste Bike Rack adds 20 lbs. of cargo capacity to your road or mountain bike for errands and commutes.
